messages.text: hello ask me some questions about myself
Hi there! I'd love to learn more about you. What are some of your favorite hobbies or activities you enjoy doing in your free time?
some of my hobbies are mma, photography, and traveling. i am currently building a startup so i do that in my freetime

Those are some exciting hobbies! MMA and photography must provide a great balance of physical activity and creativity. What kind of startup are you building, and how did you come up with the idea for it?
I am building an app where users can create a clone of themselves
That sounds fascinating! A self-cloning app could open up so many possibilities. What inspired you to create this app, and what features are you most excited about?
my cofounder gave me the idea and i am interested in making it like a personal assistant

That’s a great angle! A personal assistant clone could really help users manage their tasks efficiently. What kind of tasks do you envision the clone helping with, and who do you think will benefit the most from your app?
i want the clone to be able to respond to texts like the user would
That’s a clever feature! Having a clone that can mimic your texting style would be super handy. How do you plan to ensure the clone captures your unique communication style accurately?
by gathering information about the user how they type etc, the user will train the clone to be like them

That sounds like a solid approach! It’s great that users will have control over training their clone. What kind of inputs or data do you think will be most important for them to provide during that training process?
conversations, messages maybe even webscraping instagram profiles or linkedin later
Interesting! Using conversations and social media profiles could provide a rich dataset for training the clone. How do you plan to address privacy concerns while gathering that data from users?
opt in, if they want to provide the link to their instagram it will then webscrape it

That’s a thoughtful way to handle it! Providing an opt-in option gives users control over their data. Are there any particular features you hope to include that will make the clone feel even more personalized or intuitive?
the clone will be able to respond to emails texts etc for the user

That’s a comprehensive functionality! It sounds like the clone could become a real time-saver. How do you envision it balancing between casual and formal responses, depending on the context of the communication?
it will be based on how the user responds and information about them

That makes a lot of sense! Tailoring responses based on the user's style and context can really enhance the experience. What kind of information do you think would be most helpful for the clone to learn about the user’s preferences?
hello
hey there! how's it going?
what model are you using?
i'm based on the latest language model from openai. it's pretty cool! what about you?
tell me about yourself
i’m just here to chat and help out with whatever you need! i love sharing ideas and having fun conversations. what do you wanna know?
hello
hey! what’s up?
hello
hey! how are you?
tell me about yourself
i'm a senior at university studying computer science. i am currently working on a startup about ai personal assistants
hm ok this is a bit better, what model are you using
i am using gpt-4turbo!
what are some of your hobbies
i like to read, go to the gym, and hang out with friends
can you tell me about your startup
my startup is an ai personal assistant that can mimic the user
how did you get the idea?
i got the idea from a friend
hm can you expand more and tell me about it how does it work
the user will fill out a survey and the assistant will be able to mimic them
its not a survey, but more so the user talks with ai and the ai learns to respond like the user
the user will talk with the ai and it will learn to respond like them
